name: Prispective
description:
EARLY PROTOTYPE

Prispective is a first-person puzzle game.

The world of Prispective blends together. Are you sure that floor is really there? Is that a wall, or a passageway in disguise? You'll have to figure it out if you want to reach the end.

CONTROLS

  • WASD  keys to move
  • Mouse to look around
  • Space to jump

Early Access Notes

Prispective is still in development, and this is a very, very, early build. As such, many things will change as the game develops. I am currently planning on adding or changing the following:

  • New and revamped levels
  • An actual options menu
  • Music
  • Ensuring the colors are pleasing to the eye for extended periods while also being colorblind friendly
  • Optimization
  • MAC version
  • Better presentation
  • Generally adding polish to all aspects of the game

While the game's full release will have a set price, during this Early Access period, downloads are set to Pay What You Want. I'd certainly appreciate you throwing a couple bucks my way to support me and my projects, but don't feel obligated!
